entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
